other_tests.findings: Serum bromide level was 2.9 mg/dL following last MB exposure.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased to 4.3 mg/dL after 7 months of exposure.

other_tests.findings: Urine bromide level was 3.6 mg/dL following last MB exposure.
Mild slowing of motor conductions, reduced motor amplitudes, and prolongation of late responses.
Mildly impaired executive function, naming and attentional deficits.
Increased signal intensity in cerebellar dentate nuclei, periaqueductal region, dorsal midbrain, dorsal pons, and inferior olives.
